mathphrase.para: A task is something that has to be done, usually given by your boss, under the hypothesis that you do not want to. (Otherwise it is a pleasure, like working on DB2LaTeX).

mathcondition.para: Given a task to do, T

mathassertion.para: Do not perform task T today, if it can be done tomorrow.

mathproof.para: A proof will be given tomorrow.
